meanings.sent1: She rededicates her time to volunteering at the shelter every year.
meanings.sent2: After forgetting his initial purpose, he rededicates himself to his studies.
meanings.sent3: The forgetful squirrel rededicates his acorn collection efforts after a brief distraction.
meanings.sent4: Just like a phoenix rising from the ashes, she rededicates herself to her passion for painting.
meanings.sent5: The old tree rededicates its roots to seeking out water in the dry soil.

meanings.definition: To commit or devote oneself again
meanings.sent1: He rededicates his loyalty to his best friend after their argument.
meanings.sent2: The athlete rededicates herself to training for the upcoming competition.
meanings.sent3: The forgetful student rededicates his focus to studying for the test.
meanings.sent4: Like a knight reaffirming his vow, she rededicates herself to her cause.
meanings.sent5: The gardener rededicates her efforts to nurturing the wilting flowers back to health.
